meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joshua Parr Maria Santonato Tim Kutz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7241.

td.p: Joshua Parr, a high school teacher from Montreal, Quebec, Canada
Maria Santonato, a marketing project manager from Chicago, Illinois
Tim Kutz, a data conversion manager from Ogden, Utah (whose 3-day cash winnings total $82,599)

tr.td: THE IMAGE AWARDS
REAL ESTATE
PIN THE STAR ON THE CONSTELLATION
SAME FIRST & LAST LETTER
THIRD
FERGUSON

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
